mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat( chat_num, chatroom_num, mem_num, message ) VALUES( #{chat_num}, #{chatroom_num}, #{mem_num}, #{message} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
REPLACE(REPLACE(message,'<','<'),'>','>') message, /*html 불허*/ chat_date, read_count, mem_num, mem_id, mem_nickname FROM chat LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT chat_num, COUNT(*) read_count FROM chat_read GROUP BY chat_num) USING (chat_num) JOIN member USING (mem_num) WHERE chatroom_num = #{chatroom_num} ORDER BY chat_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chatroom WHERE seller_num=#{seller_num} OR buyer_num=#{buyer_num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM(SELECT * FROM chatroom r LEFT OUTER JOIN trading USING (trade_num) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT chatroom_num, mem_num, COUNT(*) room_cnt FROM chat_read WHERE mem_num=#{user_mem_num} GROUP BY chatroom_num, mem_num) e USING(chatroom_num) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE chat_num IN (SELECT MAX(chat_num) chat_num FROM chat GROUP BY chatroom_num)) USING(chatroom_num) WHERE seller_num=#{seller_num} OR buyer_num=#{buyer_num} ORDER BY chatroom_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
